    By calling the appropriate handler, the user plays an assistant card. idUser is not necessary since only one player is the active player at this point of the game If the planning phase is over, starts the action phase

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(List<Integer> playerNumbers, GameRuleEnum gameRule)
      Creates a new game controller
      Parameters:
      playerNumbers - the idUsers of the users playing: the user whose id is in position 0 will be PlayerEnum.PLAYER1, etc..
      gameRule - the rules chosen for this game

    • Controller

      @Deprecated public Controller()
      Deprecated.
      Used for tests only

  • Method Details

    • createSimpleGame

      private boolean createSimpleGame()
      Creates a game with simple rules using the wizards, tower colors and nicknames stored in playerCreation
      Returns:
      true if the creation succeeded

    • createAdvancedGame

      private boolean createAdvancedGame()
      Creates a game with advanced rules using the wizards, tower colors and nicknames stored in playerCreation, and the default amount of coins and character cards, stored in AdvancedParameterHandler
      Returns:
      true if the creation succeeded

    • createPlayerCreation

      private void createPlayerCreation()
      Creates the player creation handler

    • createBasicHandlers

      private void createBasicHandlers(boolean advanced)
      Creates the handlers for this controller, depending on whether the game is simple or advanced It doesn't create the handlers that were necessary prior to the start of the actual game
      Parameters:
      advanced - true if the game needs to be its advanced variation

    • createView

      private void createView()
      Creates the virtual view for this game

    • getSimpleGame

      public SimpleGame getSimpleGame()
      Only for testing purposes

    • getAdvancedGame

      public AdvancedGame getAdvancedGame()
      Only for testing purposes

    • getPositionFromUserId

      private int getPositionFromUserId(Integer idUser)
      Gets the position from the associative array playerNumbers
      Parameters:
      idUser - the user of which we want to know the numbering in the game
      Returns:
      the number of this user in the game, or -1 if the id was not found

    • isAllSet

      private boolean isAllSet()
      Checks whether the game has all the parameters needed to start
      Returns:
      true if all wizards and colors have been assigned

    • startPlayingGame

      public boolean startPlayingGame()
      Once the relevant information has been obtained, creates and starts the actual game
      Returns:
      true if the game was created successfully

    • gameWon

      private void gameWon()
      Sets this game "gameWon" flag to true

    • allStudentsMoved

      public boolean allStudentsMoved()
      By calling the appropriate handler, checks whether all students have moved for this turn
      Returns:
      true if all students have moved for this action phase

    • getTowerColorsAvailable

      public List<TeamEnum> getTowerColorsAvailable()
      Gets all the team colors that are still available for choosing
      Returns:
      a list of all the team colors (as TeamEnum) still available

    • getWizardsAvailable

      public List<WizardEnum> getWizardsAvailable()
      Gets all the wizards that are still available for choosing
      Returns:
      a list of all the wizards (as WizardEnum) still available

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Checks whether all wizards and towers have been chosen for this game
      Returns:
      true if all selections were made and the game started

    • getCardRequirements

      public Requirements getCardRequirements()
      Returns the card requirements for the currently selected card
      Returns:
      the requirements for the card, or null if there was no selected card

    • unsetGameStarted

      public void unsetGameStarted()
      Sets the flag used for detecting whether the game started to false

      public boolean isPlayerCreationModified()

    • setNewTurn

      public void setNewTurn(boolean value)
      To be set to true if there is another player that should now take control, either for the planning or action phase
      Parameters:
      value - true if after the handling of this command a different player should take control

      public boolean isNetworkError()

    • isMyTurn

      public boolean isMyTurn(int idUser)
      Returs true if the current player is the one whose id matches the input parameter
      Parameters:
      idUser - the user asking whether they're the current player
      Returns:
      true if it's this user's turn

    • getGamePhase

      public PhaseEnum getGamePhase()

    • getView

      public VirtualViewBean getView()
      Gets the current virtual view as a bean containing all the beans of game elements
      Returns:
      a VirtualViewBean, containing either the simple or advanced game information

    • checkInstantWinner

      public boolean checkInstantWinner()
      Checks whether at this moment someone won the game Checks the condition of having no more towers or having too few island groups left
      Returns:
      true if a team won the game

    • checkDeferredWinner

      public boolean checkDeferredWinner()
      To be called after a turn ends, checks the winning conditions other than having no more towers or there being too few island groups
      Returns:
      true if a team won the game

    • setNickname

      public boolean setNickname(String nickname, Integer idUser)
      By calling the appropriate handler, sets the nickname of the user with the given id in the PlayerCreation class
      Parameters:
      nickname - a string representing the nickname of the user
      idUser - the user with the given nickname
      Returns:
      true if the assignment succeeded

    • setWizard

      public boolean setWizard(Integer idWizard, Integer idUser)
      By calling the appropriate handler, selects the wizard for this user If the wizard was already taken by someone else then the method rightly fails If it was taken by the same player, the method exits without reassigning an already assigned wizard, returning false
      Parameters:
      idWizard - the wizard chosen by the user
      idUser - the user that selects the wizard
      Returns:
      true if the assignment succeeded

    • setTeamColor

      public boolean setTeamColor(TeamEnum towerColor, Integer idUser)
      By calling the appropriate handler, sets the team color for this user If the color was already taken by someone else then the method rightly fails If it was taken by the same player, the method exits without reassigning an already assigned team color, returning false
      Parameters:
      towerColor - the tower color chosen
      idUser - the user that chooses the team
      Returns:
      true if the new assignment succeeded

    • askForControl

      @Deprecated public boolean askForControl(Integer idUser, PhaseEnum gamePhase)
      Deprecated.
      By calling the appropriate handler, the user sends a request asking if it's their turn to move
      Parameters:
      idUser - the user requesting control
      gamePhase - the phase that the user is requesting control for
      Returns:
      true if the user gained control

    • playAssistant

      public boolean playAssistant(Integer idAssistant)
      By calling the appropriate handler, the user plays an assistant card. idUser is not necessary since only one player is the active player at this point of the game If the planning phase is over, starts the action phase
      Parameters:
      idAssistant - the id of the assistant card to play (1 <= id <= 10)
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • selectStudent

      public boolean selectStudent(Integer selectedStudent)
      By calling the appropriate handler, selects the given student, if no other was previously selected
      Parameters:
      selectedStudent - the position of the student to select
      Returns:
      true if the selection was successful

    • putInHall

      public boolean putInHall()
      By calling the appropriate handler, the selected student is put in the active player's hall
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • putInIsland

      public boolean putInIsland(Integer idIsland)
      By calling the appropriate handler, puts the student on the specified island group
      Parameters:
      idIsland - the id of the islandGroup on which to put the student
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • deselectStudent

      public boolean deselectStudent()
      By calling the appropriate handler, deselects the currently selected student
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • moveMNToIsland

      public boolean moveMNToIsland(Integer steps)
      By calling the appropriate handler, moves mother nature by the given amount of steps Calls all the methods needed to check for changes in the board like tower building
      Parameters:
      steps - the amount of steps MN will take
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • chooseCloud

      public boolean chooseCloud(Integer idCloud)
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method refills the player's entrance with the students from the selected cloud
      Parameters:
      idCloud - the id of the cloud to take students from
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • endTurn

      public boolean endTurn()
      By calling the appropriate handler, ends this player's action phase
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • selectCard

      public boolean selectCard(Integer cardPosition)
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method checks whether a player can play a character card
      Parameters:
      cardPosition - the position of the character card in the view
      Returns:
      true if the card can be played

    • selectStudentColor

      public boolean selectStudentColor(List<StudentEnum> colors)
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method selects the chosen color
      Parameters:
      colors - the student colors the user selected
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • selectStudentsOnCard

      public boolean selectStudentsOnCard(List<Integer> students)
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method selects the students on the character card
      Parameters:
      students - the positions of the students on the card
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • selectEntranceStudents

      public boolean selectEntranceStudents(List<Integer> students)
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method selects the students at the entrance
      Parameters:
      students - the positions of the students at the entrance
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • selectIslandGroups

      public boolean selectIslandGroups(List<Integer> islandIds)
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method selects the island groups
      Parameters:
      islandIds - the ids of the island groups chosen
      Returns:
      true if the action succeeded

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard()
      By calling the appropriate handler, this method plays the character card
      Returns:
      true if the activation was successful

    • setError

      public void setError(String error)
      Set error message to show
      Parameters:
      error - the error message to show

    • getGameErrorMessage

      public String getGameErrorMessage()

    • createSimpleGame

      public void createSimpleGame(int numPlayers, List<Integer> selectedWizards, List<TeamEnum> teamColors, List<String> nicknames)
      For tests only

    • lostConnectionHandle

      public void lostConnectionHandle(int idUser)
      Sets the disconnected user as the parameter, then calls the parameter-less method
      Parameters:
      idUser - the user that caused the disconnection

    • lostConnectionHandle

      public void lostConnectionHandle()
      The controller takes the actions necessary to signal that the game was interrupted due to connection being lost
